issue.subject: Link to archived file
issue.description:
*Description*

Modification of the archiving plugin.
* Once a processing operation is finished and the result exported, the result file is no longer available in EXTRACT (temporary files deleted).
* to allow the user to retrieve the files if an archiving task has been used, the archive path must be displayed in the return message in the log
* The message replaces the OK, with "Location : [complete_archive_path]" / "Emplacement : [complete_archive_path]"

*Model*

Currently:

!17758_before.png!

Desired behaviour:

!17758_after2.png!

Source (french) : https://projets.asitvd.ch/issues/17758

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: Users know where the files have been archived by looking at the history table/log
